info.name: WordPress Analyzer & Summary API
info.description:
Combined API for WordPress site analysis and document/video summarization using Gemini.

## Available Endpoints:
- **WordPress** - Analyze WordPress sites (version, theme, plugins)
- **Summarize** - Summarize documents and videos from URLs using Gemini 2.5 Flash
- **Health** - Health check

## Model: Gemini 2.5 Flash (for all summarization)

## Version: 3.0.0

request.description: Health check endpoint to verify the API is running.

## Analyze a WordPress site

Detects WordPress version, theme, plugins, and site metadata without authentication.

### Query Parameters:
- `url` (required) - The WordPress site URL to analyze

response.name: Success - WordPress Site
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "summary": "WordPress Version: 6.4.2
Theme: flavor (v1.0.0)

Active Plugins (3):
  - Jetpack (v12.1)
  - Yoast SEO (v21.6)
  - Akismet (v5.3)

Site Title: WordPress.org"
}

response.name: Not a WordPress Site

item.name: Summarize

request.description:
## Summarize documents from URLs using Gemini 2.5 Flash

Downloads PDF, DOCX, or TXT files from URLs and generates summaries.
Gemini sees both text AND images inside PDFs.

### Supported File Types:
- **PDF** - Sent directly to Gemini (text + images)
- **DOCX** - Converted to PDF first, then sent to Gemini (preserves images)
- **TXT** - Text content sent to Gemini

### Model: Gemini 2.5 Flash

### Request Body:
```json
[
    "https://example.com/doc1.pdf",
    "https://example.com/doc2.docx"
]
```

response.name: Success

request.description:
## Summarize videos from URLs using Gemini 2.5 Flash

### Supported URL Types:
- **YouTube URLs** - Passed directly to Gemini (no download needed)
- **Loom URLs** - Extracts download URL via Loom API, downloads and uploads to Gemini
- **Direct video URLs** (.mp4, .mov, etc.) - Downloaded and uploaded to Gemini File API

### Model: Gemini 2.5 Flash

response.name: Success
